name: FortressBot
desc: Moderation discord bot capable of auto-deleting server invite links and auto-cleaning of usernames/nicknames

name: StatusBot
desc: A special discord bot made to notify users of other bots going offline

name: TridentFrame
desc: The swiss army knife of GIF/APNG manipulation with a modern UI and wide range of features

name: Rhombus
